answers.answer: Havent been officially diagnosed. But its sounding like it

Yeah...well hopefully they give u a diagnoses soon. I hear they induce labor if blood pressure cannot be kept under control with meds. Not trying to scare you but thats what my sis in law went through. At least your almost 36 weeks so baby will be fine if thays what they end up doing. Hope ur appointment goess well. Take care
She only eighteen weeks they will probably try I higher dosage

Omg :/ im sry, i thought u were 35 weeks. So being 18 weeks im sure that bed rest would be a smart option. Keep us updated after ur appointment. I would like to know because my BP has been fluctuating as well.

Protein is high which normally wouldnt happen till later in pregnancy if it increased at all, so that means I am now high risk. Checked every 2 weeks. Increasing bp meds to see how my body reacts. But, reality is that I will more than likely be on bed rest sooner rather than later and looking at possible early delivery.

question: Im 35 and 18 weeks today. Past 2 days blood pressure has gone up. 150's/90's. Short of breath and light headed. Headed to doc now but everything I read says ill be put on bed rest if this doesnt get under control. Doc put me on bp meds last visit. Obviously the meds aren't helping.  Anyone else going through this?
title: high blood pressure
